definition: abbr. for Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区[Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]/abbr. for Nanjing 南京[Nan2 jing1]/surname Ning
give me liberty or give me death
pinyin: bu4 zi4 you2 , wu2 ning4 si3

sentences.english: Three generations of hereditary patriarchal system is rather profound social basis of Confucian culture.
sentences.chinese: 三代遺傳的宗法制度毋寧是儒家文化的深厚社會基礎。

sentences.english: That is not too bad a new year resolution.
sentences.chinese: 看春晚，毋寧死，也許這是個不錯的新年新立志。

sentences.english: He is not so much a writer as a reporter.
sentences.chinese: 他與其說是個作家，毋寧說是個記者。

sentences.english: Who said 'Give me Liberty, or give me Death?'
sentences.chinese: 是誰說過”不自由，毋寧死“？”
